channel.title: Vim on Keep calm and write something
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on Keep calm and write something

item.title: Git Tips
item.description: Open vim tabs with changed files vim -p `git diff --name-only` vim -p -p[N] Open N tab pages. When N is omitted, open one tab page for each file. git diff --name-only --name-only Show only names of changed files.
